Here's a link to a site that has links to a great number of sites for and against both candidates. Some interesting reading for everyone.
 
 http://www.newsmax.com/hottopics/Sen_John_Kerry.shtml
 
 Check 'em out!

Newsmax. And you say you aren't a Republican. 
 
 Next time I want extremely skewed, distorted, corrupt, and distorted "facts," i'll go look in the National Inqurier, after all, it's just as good as Newsmax. 
 
 Read up on your little site's problems

Newsmax. And you say you aren't a Republican. 
 
 Next time I want extremely skewed, distorted, corrupt, and distorted "facts," i'll go look in the National Inqurier, after all, it's just as good as Newsmax.

Evidently, you're too poor to pay attention.
 
 I didn't say I was Republican.
 
 I didn't say I wasn't Republican.
 
 Learn to read the words and piece them together as they are. Don't put your own spin on simple statements.
 
 The link I posted contains links to articles for and against both sides. If you'd bothered to read even the titles of them, you'd see that.
